artist: Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Fashion periodical in blue paper covers (P.15,519) bound with folded music sheet (P.15,520) with score on the recto and verso; includes a hand-colored engraving of an elaborately dressed canopy bed and two chairs (P.15,518)
medium: Hand-colored engraving; engraved musical score; letterpress
portfolio: From Journal de la Mode et du Goût, ou amusemens du salon et de la toilette, Paris, 1790–92
title: Journal de la Mode et du Goût, Dix-huitième Cahier, 15 Août 1790
